details:
Secunia Research reports:

> CVE-2018-5800: An off-by-one error within the "LibRaw::kodak\_ycbcr\_load\_raw()"
> function (internal/dcraw\_common.cpp) can be exploited to cause a heap-based
> buffer overflow and subsequently cause a crash.
>
> CVE-2017-5801: An error within the "LibRaw::unpack()" function
> (src/libraw\_cxx.cpp) can be exploited to trigger a NULL pointer dereference.
>
> CVE-2017-5802: An error within the "kodak\_radc\_load\_raw()" function
> (internal/dcraw\_common.cpp) related to the "buf" variable can be exploited
> to cause an out-of-bounds read memory access and subsequently cause a crash.
